snippet.title: Chocolate Carol - Trailer
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW: https://maravex.itch.io/chocolate-carol

Chocolate Carol is a short visual novel, where you sell hot chocolate to the locals. However, on one fateful night, an unfamiliar patron comes to you with news of a crime that occurred … very near your stall. Can you find the culprit with the clues each of the customers give you?

CREATORS:
Maravex: 
https://twitter.com/Maravex
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfpZVYU95qUq45UZVSJet_A
Lunatic Tales Studio:
https://www.patreon.com/lunatictalesstudio
https://www.instagram.com/lunatictalesstudio/
https://twitter.com/LunaticTales_
SinLingereep: 
https://www.youtube.com/@Sin_Ligereep/featured
https://twitter.com/SinLigereep?lang=en
https://www.patreon.com/SinLigereep
